chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has the following issue.

Thanks,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and home appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to process a refund if necessary.

The customer must meet the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall.
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipts must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for laptops and home appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 days to process a refund if necessary.

Hello ecomobile,

I hope you're having a great day!

This is Wilber from Back Market Customer Care

Our customer has asked for a refund, regarding that you have not sent the device, I was wondering if you couldn't ship this device and just process with the refund as a customer's solution.

Thanks for your matters!

Best regards,
Wilber Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We will contact our logistics partner to inform them of the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
